title: Ticket #6391: Fix build without gsoap
remarks:
2018-Jan-12 09:58:32 by quintinhill:
Since this is patch works for me on Windows can you please send an error log caused by the patch so I can investigate why this fails.

2018-Jan-12 10:55:21 by quintinhill:
The inclusion of the problematic file is soap_setupStub.c is guarded by the following in src/condor_tools/CMakeList.txt: if( WINDOWS ) if(NOT (MSVC_VERSION LESS 1700)) condor_exe(condor_setup "condor_setup.c;soap_setupStub.cpp" ${C_BIN} "${CONDOR_TOOL_LIBS}" OFF) else() condor_exe(condor_setup "condor_setup.c" ${C_BIN} "${CONDOR_TOOL_LIBS}" OFF) endif()

Maybe the fix should be to change this condition somehow.

2018-Jul-16 12:09:05 by tim:
I am going to abandon this ticket. GSOAP as been removed from the 8.7 series. Soon, it will be the new stable series.
attachments: • 0005-condor_tools-fix-build-without-gsoap.patch 760 bytes added by quintinhill on 2017-Aug-30 14:02:51 UTC.
check_ins:
2017-Dec-08 11:38   Check-in [52956]: Revert "(#6391) Fix build without gsoap" This reverts commit ab734e507eecd2dec1a3ba7732287104d90e8702. Breaks windows builds (By Tim Theisen )
2017-Dec-08 10:50   Check-in [52953]: (#6391) Fix build without gsoap (By Tim Theisen )
